body_html:
I've seen this bug on gcc 4.9 - can you try installing 4.8 manually, and then running it like this:

make -f tensorflow/contrib/makefile/Makefile HOST_OS=PI TARGET=PI \
OPTFLAGS="-Os -mfpu=neon-vfpv4 -funsafe-math-optimizations -ftree-vectorize" \
CXX=g++-4.8
body_text:
I've seen this bug on gcc 4.9 - can you try installing 4.8 manually, and then running it like this:
make -f tensorflow/contrib/makefile/Makefile HOST_OS=PI TARGET=PI \
OPTFLAGS="-Os -mfpu=neon-vfpv4 -funsafe-math-optimizations -ftree-vectorize" \
CXX=g++-4.8
body:
I've seen this bug on gcc 4.9 - can you try installing 4.8 manually, and then running it like this:

``` bash
make -f tensorflow/contrib/makefile/Makefile HOST_OS=PI TARGET=PI \
OPTFLAGS="-Os -mfpu=neon-vfpv4 -funsafe-math-optimizations -ftree-vectorize" \
CXX=g++-4.8
```
